description: Safer is a family-owned company specializing in biological products for agriculture, including plant extracts, fungicides, and biofertilizers. Founded in 1997, the company focuses on sustainable farming solutions, promoting environmental responsibility. With nearly 200 employees, Safer operates primarily in Colombia, exporting to countries like Ecuador and Panama. The company emphasizes social responsibility, supporting local farmers and sponsoring youth cycling initiatives to combat poverty and violence in marginalized areas.
name: Safer
